articles.author: Daniel Orme
articles.title: Stephen Pagliuca net worth as Chelsea takeover bid lodged ahead of major Raine decisions - Football.London
articles.description: The American businessman is reportedly one of a number of parties having lodged bids for Chelsea and appears to have the wealth to potentially do a deal
articles.content: American businessman Stephen Pagliuca has reportedly lodged a bid for Chelsea. Co-owner of NBA outfit Boston Celtics, the 67-year-old is apparently interested in becoming Roman Abramovichs successor … [+1988 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Morrison
articles.title: SpaceX astronauts name their spacecraft Freedom in tribute to first American in space Alan Shepard - Daily Mail
articles.description: Known as the Crew-4 mission, it will carry NASA's Kjell N. Lindgren,  Robert Hines, and Jessica Watkins, and ESA's Samantha Cristoforetti to the ISS no earlier than April 19.
articles.content:
The next SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule to take NASA and European Space Agency (ESA) astronauts to the ISS has been named 'Freedom' by its crew.
Known as the Crew-4 mission, it will carry NASA's Kjell N… [+3988 chars]

articles.author: Dominic Bossi
articles.title: ‘Fortress Australia’ breached as Socceroos miss out on direct qualification to Qatar - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: A 2-0 loss to Japan at home has consigned the Socceroos to a third-placed finish in the group, putting them on a path to a play-off against South Americans.
articles.content: A World Cup campaign that began with so much promise is ending in a whimper after the Socceroos missed out on automatic qualification to the 2022 World Cup in Qatar, suffering a 2-0 loss to Japan to … [+2045 chars]
